MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY15 postcode area of Cupar. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:20pm due to a safety concern with the underground cable network near to Union Fruit Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 3:22 PM on Wednesday, 02 December 2020.
